casebody.data:
SHOE FORM CO., Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. IRWIN CORPORATION, DefendantAppellee. No. 62, Docket 20729. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 17, 1947. Holland & Armstrong, of New York City (Norman N. Holland, of New York City, Frederick L. Edmands, of Boston, Mass., and Dudley W. King, of New York City, •of counsel), for appellants. W. Lee Helms, of New York City, for appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE and CLARK, -Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on opinion below, 68 E.Supp. 618.
